text: Oligotrophini is a tribe of gall midges, insects in the family Cecidomyiidae. There are at least 20 genera and 300 described species in Oligotrophini. Rhopalomyia solidaginis ==Genera== These 21 genera belong to the tribe Oligotrophini. Dasineura tumidosae, larvae Rhopalomyia solidaginis, pupa ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * ==External links== * Category:Cecidomyiinae Category:Brachycera tribes
title: Oligotrophini
